General.Name: Interbud-Lublin SA
General.Description: Interbud-Lublin S.A. operates as a construction and development company in Poland. It undertakes the construction of multi-family residential building projects, and semi-detached single-family residential projects. The company provides supervising of construction, sanitary, electrical, and road construction documentation; construction budget; implementation of contracts; and settlement of the current construction site. The company was formerly known as Company Sanitary and Electrical INTERBUD Limited Liability Company and changed its name to Interbud-Lublin S.A. in December 2007. Interbud-Lublin S.A. was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Lublin, Poland.
